title: [Lyson's Outfitting]

[Lyson's General Store]
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A white marble shelf sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

Plain wooden walls rise from an unfinished wooden floor.  Just above a worn rug hangs a tattered merchant permit, and an uneven wooden ceiling completes the picture.  A white marble shelf stands in the middle of the room.
